feeds.title: Policing Resources

feeds.description: A Bill to make provision for state-maintained schools to promote the mental health and well-being of their pupils alongside academic attainment
feeds.title: Schools (Mental Health and Wellbeing)

feeds.description: A Bill to make provision for specifying new statutory rights and entitlements for victims of crime under the Code of Practice for Victims of Crime; to require elected local policing bodies to assess victims services; to increase the duties of the Commissioner for Victims and Witnesses; to grant victims the right to request a review of a decision not to prosecute; to establish reviews in homicides where no criminal charge has been made; to create an obligation on professions to notify cases of possible victims of child sexual abuse; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: Victims of Crime (Rights, Entitlements, and Notification of Child Sexual Abuse)

feeds.description: A Bill to amend the Immigration Act 1971 to grant indefinite leave to remain in the United Kingdom to all EEA nationals, their family members and extended family members who are resident in the United Kingdom on the date of exit from the European Union
feeds.title: EEA Nationals (Indefinite Leave to Remain)

feeds.description: A Bill to make provision for Members of the House of Lords to vote in elections to the House of Commons
feeds.title: Extension of Franchise (House of Lords)

feeds.description: A Bill to lower the gestational time limit for abortion to 12 weeks
feeds.title: Abortion (Foetus Protection)

feeds.description: A Bill to extend the franchise for parliamentary and other elections to all citizens over the age of 16 years
feeds.title: Voting Age (Reduction)

feeds.description: A Bill to provide certain protections for persons who live together as a couple or have lived together as a couple as cohabitants; to make provision about the property of deceased persons who are survived by a cohabitant; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: Cohabitation Rights

feeds.description: A Bill to make provision for clinical commissioning groups to ensure that persons in their area have access to specialist and generalist palliative care and appropriate support services; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: Access to Palliative Care

feeds.description: A Bill to provide for the independence of the British Broadcasting Corporation
feeds.title: BBC (Independence)

feeds.description: A Bill to replace the current regime of limits on local housing authorities’ debt with limits determined by the existing prudential regime for local authority borrowing for non-housing-related purposes
feeds.title: Local Housing Authority Debt

feeds.description: A Bill to prohibit the publication of certain information regarding persons who have been arrested until they have been charged with an offence; to set out the circumstances where such information can be published without committing an offence; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: Anonymity (Arrested Persons)

feeds.description: A Bill to restrict membership of the House of Lords by virtue of a peerage; to make related provision about disqualifications for voting at elections to, and for membership of, the House of Commons; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: House of Lords

feeds.description: A Bill to amend the law regarding the succession to Peerages; and for connected purposes
feeds.title: Succession to Peerages

feeds.description: A Bill to amend and update the powers of the Middle Level Commissioners to regulate navigation on the Middle Level of the Fens in the city of Peterborough and the counties of Cambridgeshire and Norfolk; to make further provision as to the regulation of navigation on those waterways; to make other provision as to the Commissioners; and for connected purposes.
feeds.title: Middle Level

feeds.description: A Bill to make provision for a railway between a junction with Phase One of High Speed 2, near Fradley Wood in Staffordshire, and a junction with the West Coast Main Line near Crewe in Cheshire; and for connected purposes.
feeds.title: High Speed Rail (West Midlands - Crewe)

feeds.description: A Bill to make new provision for the making of statutes for the University of London; and for related purposes.
feeds.title: University of London

feeds.description: To make provision relating to the public open spaces under the management and control of the City of London Corporation; and for related purposes.
feeds.title: City of London Corporation (Open Spaces)

feeds.description: To confer powers upon New Southgate Cemetery and Crematorium Limited and the National Spiritual Assembly of the Bahá'is of the United Kingdom to extinguish rights of burial and disturb human remains in respect of New Southgate Cemetery for the purpose of increasing the space for interments; and for connected purposes.
feeds.title: New Southgate Cemetery

feeds.description: A Bill to amend certain provisions of the Richmond Burgage Pastures Act 1853.
feeds.title: Richmond Burgage Pastures
